alert.note: Alert for Broadwater; Jefferson (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 7:32PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Broadwater and east central Jefferson Counties through 815 PM MDT... At 731 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles west of Toston, or 16 miles southwest of Townsend, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail in addition to lightning and brief heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Townsend, Toston, Silos and Radersburg. This includes Highway 12 between mile markers 1 and 3 , and between mile markers 70 and 87. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
